title: The Dark Knight
directorstars: Director:Christopher Nolan     Stars:Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
story: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
directorstars: Director:Peter Jackson     Stars:Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
story: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Inception
directorstars: Director:Christopher Nolan     Stars:Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe
story: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Shershaah
directorstars: Director:Vishnuvardhan     Stars:Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Shiv Panditt, Pranay Pachauri
story: This is a story of a PVC awardee brave Indian soldier - Capt. Vikram Batra, who shot to fame and became a household name during the Kargil War in 1999. His indomitable spirit and his unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
directorstars: Director:Peter Jackson     Stars:Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
story: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Mountain II
directorstars: Director:Alper Caglar     Stars:Caglar Ertugrul, Ufuk Bayraktar, Ahu Türkpençe, Murat Serezli
story: In a desolate war zone where screams of the innocent echo, seven Maroon Berets will dance with death on the very line between disaster and valor.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
directorstars: Director:Peter Jackson     Stars:Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
story: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: The Matrix
directorstars: Directors:Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski     Stars:Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
story: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
directorstars: Director:Irvin Kershner     Stars:Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
story: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
directorstars: Director:George Lucas     Stars:Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
story: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Hara-Kiri
directorstars: Director:Masaki Kobayashi     Stars:Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Ishihama, Shima Iwashita, Tetsurô Tanba
story: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: Seven Samurai
directorstars: Director:Akira Kurosawa     Stars:Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Tsushima, Yukiko Shimazaki
story: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

title: Raatchasan
directorstars: Director:Ram Kumar     Stars:Vishnu Vishal, Amala Paul, Radha Ravi, Sangili Murugan
story: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: Gladiator
directorstars: Director:Ridley Scott     Stars:Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
story: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Léon: The Professional
directorstars: Director:Luc Besson     Stars:Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello
story: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
directorstars: Director:James Cameron     Stars:Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick
story: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Dangal
directorstars: Director:Nitesh Tiwari     Stars:Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
story: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
directorstars: Directors:Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman     Stars:Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
story: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Avengers: Endgame
directorstars: Directors:Anthony Russo, Joe Russo     Stars:Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
story: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
directorstars: Directors:Anthony Russo, Joe Russo     Stars:Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
story: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
directorstars: Director:Christopher Nolan     Stars:Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman
story: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: Oldboy
directorstars: Director:Park Chan-Wook     Stars:Choi Min-sik, Yoo Ji-Tae, Kang Hye-jeong, Kim Byeong-Ok
story: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Princess Mononoke
directorstars: Director:Hayao Miyazaki     Stars:Yôji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida, Yûko Tanaka, Billy Crudup
story: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
directorstars: Director:Steven Spielberg     Stars:Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies
story: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

directorstars: Director:Sam Mendes     Stars:Dean-Charles Chapman, George MacKay, Daniel Mays, Colin Firth
story: April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
directorstars: Director:Aditya Dhar     Stars:Vicky Kaushal, Paresh Rawal, Mohit Raina, Yami Gautam
story: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
directorstars: Director:Prashanth Neel     Stars:Yash, Srinidhi Shetty, Ramachandra Raju, Archana Jois
story: In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

title: Vikram Vedha
directorstars: Directors:Gayatri, Pushkar     Stars:Madhavan, Vijay Sethupathi, Shraddha Srinath, Kathir
story: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
directorstars: Director:Haruo Sotozaki     Stars:Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Hiro Shimono
story: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: Aliens
directorstars: Director:James Cameron     Stars:Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser
story: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
directorstars: Director:Richard Marquand     Stars:Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
story: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
directorstars: Director:S.S. Rajamouli     Stars:Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamannaah Bhatia
story: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
directorstars: Director:Anurag Kashyap     Stars:Manoj Bajpayee, Richa Chadha, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tigmanshu Dhulia
story: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
directorstars: Director:Tigmanshu Dhulia     Stars:Irrfan Khan, Mahie Gill, Rajesh Abhay, Hemendra Dandotiya
story: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

title: Batman Begins
directorstars: Director:Christopher Nolan     Stars:Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson
story: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

title: Hera Pheri
directorstars: Director:Priyadarshan     Stars:Akshay Kumar, Suniel Shetty, Paresh Rawal, Tabu
story: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
directorstars: Director:Guy Ritchie     Stars:Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham
story: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
directorstars: Director:Steven Spielberg     Stars:Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott
story: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

title: Die Hard
directorstars: Director:John McTiernan     Stars:Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson
story: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Ran
directorstars: Director:Akira Kurosawa     Stars:Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Terao, Jinpachi Nezu, Daisuke Ryû
story: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

title: Sholay
directorstars: Director:Ramesh Sippy     Stars:Sanjeev Kumar, Dharmendra, Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan
story: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

title: Yojimbo
directorstars: Director:Akira Kurosawa     Stars:Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yôko Tsukasa
story: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Sherlock Jr.
directorstars: Director:Buster Keaton     Stars:Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Joe Keaton, Erwin Connelly
story: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Haider
directorstars: Director:Vishal Bhardwaj     Stars:Shahid Kapoor, Tabu, Shraddha Kapoor, Kay Kay Menon
story: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

title: Logan
directorstars: Director:James Mangold     Stars:Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook
story: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: 1: Nenokkadine
directorstars: Director:Sukumar     Stars:Mahesh Babu, Kriti Sanon, Nassar, Pradeep Singh Rawat
story: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

title: Vishwaroopam
directorstars: Director:Kamal Haasan     Stars:Pooja Kumar, Miles Anderson, Kamal Haasan, Rahul Bose
story: When a classical dancer's suspecting wife sets an investigator behind him, a series of violent events are triggered, revealing his real identity and connection to a darker world.

title: Thuppakki
directorstars: Director:A.R. Murugadoss     Stars:Joseph Vijay, Kajal Aggarwal, Vidyut Jammwal, Sathyan
story: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

title: Rush
directorstars: Director:Ron Howard     Stars:Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde, Alexandra Maria Lara
story: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

title: Ford v Ferrari
directorstars: Director:James Mangold     Stars:Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal, Caitriona Balfe
story: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.
